home.title: Hi, I'm Simon!
home.paragraph-1: I'm a self-taught software engineer currently balancing a professional part-time role while completing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I love building web apps to improve the life of everybody.
home.paragraph-2: Check out my blog to read about what I've been up to lately or head over to GitHub to check out my latest projects. I'm always happy to collaborate!
home.paragraph-3: Are you a recruiter? You can view my CV in the top navbar.
home.paragraph-4: Want to chat? Feel free to reach out via the contact section.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.paragraph-1:
Want to reach out regarding a collaboration or need my input on a project?
Don't hesitate! Use the contact form below, and I'll get back to you with an answer shortly.
